00048 /* Private types -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 typedef void (*pFunction)(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 *pCB);
00050 
00051 typedef enum
00052 {
00053   SBC_SUCCESS        = 0,
00054   SBC_CMD_NOTSUPPORT = 2,
00055   SBC_ERROR          = 3,
00056 } SBC_CBWState_Enum;
00057 
00058 typedef struct
00059 {
00060   u32 uAddress;
00061   u32 uLength;
00062   SBC_CBWState_Enum CommandStatus;
00063 } SBCInfo_Typedef;
00064 
00065 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00066 #define SBC_CMD_COUNT           (10)
00067 
00068 #define _LENGTH_VITAL_PRODUCT                     (sizeof(guSBC_VitalProductData))
00069 #define _LENGTH_INQUIRYDATA                       (sizeof(SBC_InquiryData_TypeDef))
00070 #define _LENGTH_SENSE_DATA                        (sizeof(SBC_SenseData_TypeDef))
00071 #define _LENGTH_READFORMATCAP_DATA                (sizeof(guSBC_ReadFormatCapacityData))
00072 #define _LENGTH_READCAP10_DATA                    (sizeof(guSBC_ReadCapacity10Data))
00073

00088 /* Private macro -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00089 #define BE2LE32(bytes)    ((bytes[0] << 24) | (bytes[1] << 16) | (bytes[2] << 8) | (bytes[3] << 0))
00090 #define BE2LE16(bytes)    ((bytes[0] <<  8) | (bytes[1] <<  0))

00149 __ALIGN4 static u8 guSBC_ReadFormatCapacityData[] =
00150 {
00151   0x00,
00152   0x00,
00153   0x00,
00154   0x08,                                 /* Capacity List Length                                             */
00155   0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,               /* Block Count                                                      */
00156   0x02,                                 /* Descriptor Code: 0x02 for Formatted Media                        */
00157   0x00, 0x00, 0x00,                     /* Logical Block Length In Bytes                                    */
00158 };
00159 
00160 __ALIGN4 static u8 guSBC_ReadCapacity10Data[] =
00161 {
00162   0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,               /* Returned Logical Block Address                                   */
00163   0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,               /* Logical Block Length In Bytes                                    */
00164 };

00368 
00369 /* Global Function -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00370 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00371   * @brief  SCSI Block Command initialization.
00372   * @param  pMedia: Target Media
00373   * @param  uLun: Logic Unit Number
00374   * @retval None
00375   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00376 void SBC_Init(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u32 uLun)
00377 {
00378   pMedia->pSBC_InquiryData = (u8 *)(&gSBC_InquiryData[uLun]);
00379   pMedia->pSBC_SenseData = (u8 *)(&gSBC_SenseData[uLun]);
00380 
00381   return;
00382 }
00383 
00384 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00385   * @brief  SCSI BLock Command Handler.
00386   * @param  pMedia: Target Media
00387   * @param  pCB: Buffer pointer of command block (CB)
00388   * @retval None
00389   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00390 void SBC_CMDHandler(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 *pCB)
00391 {
00392   #if (USBDCORE_DEBUG == 1)
00393   u8 uCommand = *pCB;
00394   #endif
00395   u32 uCommandIndex;
00396   gSBCInfo.CommandStatus = SBC_SUCCESS;
00397   gSBCInfo.uLength = 0;
00398 
00399   uCommandIndex = _SBC_FindCommand(*pCB);
00400   __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld [%02x]", __DBG_USBCount, uCommand);
00401 
00402   if (uCommandIndex != SBC_CMD_COUNT && gpFSBCMDHandler[uCommandIndex] != NULL)
00403   {
00404     __DBG_USBPrintf("S_%s\r\n", guSBCCMDString[uCommandIndex]);
00405     (*gpFSBCMDHandler[uCommandIndex])(pMedia, pCB);
00406   }
00407   else
00408   {
00409     SBC_UpdateSenseData(pMedia, SK_ILLEGAL_REQUEST, ASC_INVALID_COMMAND);
00410     gSBCInfo.CommandStatus = SBC_CMD_NOTSUPPORT;
00411   }
00412 
00413   if (gSBCInfo.CommandStatus != SBC_SUCCESS)
00414   {
00415     BOT_ErrorHandler(BOT_STALL_BYDIR, BOT_CSW_STATUS_FAILED);
00416   }
00417 
00418   return;
00419 }
00420 
00421 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00422   * @brief  SBC Data IN related command.
00423   * @param  pMedia: Target Media
00424   * @param  pCB: buffer pointer of command block (CB)
00425   * @retval None
00426   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00427 void SBC_DataIN(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 *pCB)
00428 {
00429   u32 uCommand = pCB[0];
00430   switch (uCommand)
00431   {
00432     case SBC_CMD_READ_10:
00433     {
00434       _SBC_CMDRead10(pMedia, pCB);
00435       break;
00436     }
00437     /*
00438     case OTHER_SBC_COMMAND:
00439     {
00440       break;
00441     }
00442     */
00443     default:
00444     {
00445       SBC_UpdateSenseData(pMedia, SK_ILLEGAL_REQUEST, ASC_INVALID_FIELED_IN_COMMAND);
00446       gSBCInfo.CommandStatus = SBC_CMD_NOTSUPPORT;
00447       break;
00448     }
00449   }
00450 
00451   if (gSBCInfo.CommandStatus != SBC_SUCCESS)
00452   {
00453     BOT_ErrorHandler(BOT_STALL_BYDIR, BOT_CSW_STATUS_FAILED);
00454   }
00455 
00456   return;
00457 }
00458 
00459 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00460   * @brief  SBC Data OUT related command.
00461   * @param  pMedia: Target Media
00462   * @param  pCB: buffer pointer of command block (CB)
00463   * @retval None
00464   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00465 void SBC_DataOUT(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 *pCB)
00466 {
00467   u32 uCommand = pCB[0];
00468   switch (uCommand)
00469   {
00470     case SBC_CMD_WRITE_10:
00471     {
00472       _SBC_CMDWrite10(pMedia, pCB);
00473       break;
00474     }
00475     /*
00476     case OTHER_SBC_COMMAND:
00477     {
00478       break;
00479     }
00480     */
00481     default:
00482     {
00483       SBC_UpdateSenseData(pMedia, SK_ILLEGAL_REQUEST, ASC_INVALID_FIELED_IN_COMMAND);
00484       gSBCInfo.CommandStatus = SBC_CMD_NOTSUPPORT;
00485       break;
00486     }
00487   }
00488 
00489   if (gSBCInfo.CommandStatus != SBC_SUCCESS)
00490   {
00491     BOT_ErrorHandler(BOT_STALL_BYDIR, BOT_CSW_STATUS_FAILED);
00492   }
00493 
00494   return;
00495 }
00496 
00497 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00498   * @brief  Update sense data for Request Sense SCSI command.
00499   * @param  pMedia: Target Media to update sense data
00500   * @param  uSenseKey: Indicates generic information describing an error or exception condition.
00501   * @param  uAdditionalSenseCode: Indicates further information related to the error or exception
00502   *         condition reported in the SENSE KEY field.
00503   * @retval None
00504   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00505 void SBC_UpdateSenseData(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 uSenseKey, u8 uAdditionalSenseCode)
00506 {
00507   SBC_SenseData_TypeDef *pSenseData = (SBC_SenseData_TypeDef *)pMedia->pSBC_SenseData;
00508 
00509   pSenseData->SenseKey = uSenseKey;
00510   pSenseData->AdditionalSenseCode = uAdditionalSenseCode;
00511 
00512   return;
00513 }
00514 
00515 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00516 
00517 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00518   * @brief  SCSI Block Command (SPC-4) - Inquiry (0x12).
00519   * @param  pMedia: Target Media
00520   * @param  pCB: Buffer pointer of command block (CB)
00521   * @retval None
00522   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00523 static void _SBC_CMDInquiry(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 *pCB)
00524 {
00525   u8 *pBuffer;
00526   SBC_CMDInquiry_TypeDef *pCMD = (SBC_CMDInquiry_TypeDef *)pCB;
00527   u32 uLength = BE2LE16(pCMD->AllocationLength);
00528 
00529   if (BOT_CheckCBWParameter(BOT_DIR_IN, uLength) == FALSE)
00530   {
00531     return;
00532   }
00533 
00534   if (pCMD->EVPD == 1)
00535   {
00536     pBuffer = (u8 *)guSBC_VitalProductData;
00537     uLength = _LENGTH_VITAL_PRODUCT;
00538   }
00539   else
00540   {
00541     pBuffer = (u8 *)(pMedia->pSBC_InquiryData);
00542     uLength = (uLength <= _LENGTH_INQUIRYDATA) ? uLength : _LENGTH_INQUIRYDATA;
00543   }
00544 
00545   BOT_WriteINData(pBuffer, uLength, BOT_STATE_DATAIN_LAST);
00546 
00547   return;
00548 }
00549 
00550 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00551   * @brief  SCSI Block Command (SPC-4) - Request Sense (0x03).
00552   * @param  pMedia: Target Media
00553   * @param  pCB: Buffer pointer of command block (CB)
00554   * @retval None
00555   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00556 static void _SBC_CMDRequestSense(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 *pCB)
00557 {
00558   SBC_CMDRequestSense_TypeDef *pCMD = (SBC_CMDRequestSense_TypeDef *)pCB;
00559   u32 uLength = BE2LE16(pCMD->AllocationLength);
00560   if (BOT_CheckCBWParameter(BOT_DIR_IN, uLength) == FALSE)
00561   {
00562     return;
00563   }
00564 
00565   uLength = (uLength <= _LENGTH_SENSE_DATA) ? uLength : _LENGTH_SENSE_DATA;
00566   BOT_WriteINData((u8 *)(pMedia->pSBC_SenseData), uLength, BOT_STATE_DATAIN_LAST);
00567   SBC_UpdateSenseData(pMedia, SK_NO_SENSE, 0x0);
00568 
00569   return;
00570 }
00571 
00572 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00573   * @brief  SCSI Block Command (SPC-4) - Test Unit Ready (0x00).
00574   * @param  pMedia: Target Media
00575   * @param  pCB: Buffer pointer of command block (CB)
00576   * @retval None
00577   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00578 static void _SBC_CMDTestUnitReady(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 *pCB)
00579 {
00580   BOT_CSW_STATUS_Enum status = BOT_CSW_STATUS_PASSED;
00581   if (BOT_CheckCBWParameter(BOT_DIR_NONE, 0) == FALSE)
00582   {
00583     return;
00584   }
00585 
00586   if (pMedia->GetStatus(pMedia->uId, &(pMedia->Size)) == FALSE)
00587   {
00588     SBC_UpdateSenseData(pMedia, SK_NOT_READY, ASC_MEDIUM_NOT_PRESENT);
00589     status = BOT_CSW_STATUS_FAILED;
00590   }
00591 
00592   BOT_SendCSW(status);
00593 
00594   return;
00595 }
00596 
00597 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00598   * @brief  SCSI Block Command (SBC-3) - Read 10 (0x28).
00599   * @param  pMedia: Target Media
00600   * @param  pCB: Buffer pointer of command block (CB)
00601   * @retval None
00602   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00603 static void _SBC_CMDRead10(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 *pCB)
00604 {
00605   u32 uLen;
00606   u32 uAddr;
00607   u32 uBlkCnt;
00608   u8 *pBuffer;
00609   BOT_State_Enum status = BOT_STATE_DATAIN;
00610 
00611   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00612   /* When receive SBC Read 10 command, get address from CB and read first block of data. Send the data to   */
00613   /* USB Buffer for IN transmission. The BOT state machine will call this function again when IN data       */
00614   /* transmission is finished.                                                                              */
00615   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00616   if (gSBCInfo.uLength == 0)
00617   {
00618     _SBC_GetAddress(pCB, pMedia->Size.uBlockSize);
00619     if (BOT_CheckCBWParameter(BOT_DIR_IN, gSBCInfo.uLength) == FALSE)
00620     {
00621       return;
00622     }
00623     uAddr = gSBCInfo.uAddress;
00624     uBlkCnt = gSBCInfo.uLength / pMedia->Size.uBlockSize;
00625     if ((uAddr + uBlkCnt) > pMedia->Size.uBlockCount)
00626     {
00627       SBC_UpdateSenseData(pMedia, SK_ILLEGAL_REQUEST, ASC_ADDRESS_OUT_OF_RANGE);
00628       gSBCInfo.CommandStatus = SBC_ERROR;
00629       return;
00630     }
00631     if (pMedia->Size.uAddressMode == BOT_ADDR_MODE_BYTE)
00632     {
00633       gSBCInfo.uAddress *= pMedia->Size.uBlockSize;
00634     }
00635   }
00636 
00637   uAddr = gSBCInfo.uAddress;
00638   uLen = (gSBCInfo.uLength > BOT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE) ? BOT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE : gSBCInfo.uLength;
00639 
00640 
00641   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00642   /* Set state as BOT_STATE_DATAIN_LAST which cause the BOT state machine send CSW to Host when IN data     */
00643   /* transmission is finished.                                                                              */
00644   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00645   if ((gSBCInfo.uLength - uLen) == 0)
00646   {
00647     status = BOT_STATE_DATAIN_LAST;
00648   }
00649 
00650   ACC_LED_ON();
00651 
00652   if (pMedia->Read(pMedia->uId, &pBuffer, uAddr, uLen) != FALSE)
00653   {
00654     BOT_WriteINData(pBuffer, uLen, status);
00655     gSBCInfo.uLength  -= uLen;
00656     if (pMedia->Size.uAddressMode == BOT_ADDR_MODE_BYTE)
00657     {
00658       gSBCInfo.uAddress += uLen;
00659     }
00660     else
00661     {
00662       if ((gSBCInfo.uLength % pMedia->Size.uBlockSize) == 0)
00663       {
00664         gSBCInfo.uAddress++;
00665       }
00666     }
00667   }
00668   else
00669   {
00670     SBC_UpdateSenseData(pMedia, SK_NOT_READY, ASC_UNRECOVERED_READ_ERROR);
00671     gSBCInfo.CommandStatus = SBC_ERROR;
00672   }
00673 
00674   ACC_LED_OFF();
00675 
00676   return;
00677 }
00678 
00679 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00680   * @brief  SCSI Block Command (SBC-3) - Write 10 (0x2A).
00681   * @param  pMedia: Target Media
00682   * @param  pCB: Buffer pointer of command block (CB)
00683   * @retval None
00684   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00685 static void _SBC_CMDWrite10(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 *pCB)
00686 {
00687   u32 uBuffer[64/4];
00688   u32 uLen;
00689   u32 uAddr;
00690   u32 uBlkCnt;
00691 
00692   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00693   /* When receive SBC Write 10 command, get address from CB and set state as OUT, then the BOT state machine*/
00694   /* will call this function when next OUT data is received.                                                */
00695   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00696   if (gSBCInfo.uLength == 0)
00697   {
00698     _SBC_GetAddress(pCB, pMedia->Size.uBlockSize);
00699     if (BOT_CheckCBWParameter(BOT_DIR_OUT, gSBCInfo.uLength) == TRUE)
00700     {
00701       /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00702       /* Read OUT data with zero length to inform USB Device peripheral that process of CBW OUT             */
00703       /* data is finished. The USB Device will send ACK to Host when received next OUT data                 */
00704       /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00705       BOT_ReadOUTData((u8 *)NULL, USB_DISCARD_OUT_DATA);
00706     }
00707     uAddr = gSBCInfo.uAddress;
00708     uBlkCnt = gSBCInfo.uLength / pMedia->Size.uBlockSize;
00709     if ((uAddr + uBlkCnt) > pMedia->Size.uBlockCount)
00710     {
00711       SBC_UpdateSenseData(pMedia, SK_ILLEGAL_REQUEST, ASC_ADDRESS_OUT_OF_RANGE);
00712       gSBCInfo.CommandStatus = SBC_ERROR;
00713     }
00714     if (pMedia->Size.uAddressMode == BOT_ADDR_MODE_BYTE)
00715     {
00716       gSBCInfo.uAddress *= pMedia->Size.uBlockSize;
00717     }
00718     return;
00719   }
00720 
00721   uAddr = gSBCInfo.uAddress;
00722   uLen = USBDCore_EPTGetTransferCount(BOT_OUT_EPT, USBD_CNTB0);
00723 
00724   BOT_ReadOUTData((u8 *)&uBuffer, uLen);
00725   if (gSBCInfo.uLength - uLen != 0)
00726   {
00727     BOT_ReadOUTData((u8 *)NULL, USB_DISCARD_OUT_DATA);
00728   }
00729 
00730   ACC_LED_ON();
00731 
00732   if (pMedia->Write(pMedia->uId, (u8 *)&uBuffer, uAddr, uLen) != FALSE)
00733   {
00734     gSBCInfo.uLength  -= uLen;
00735     if (pMedia->Size.uAddressMode == BOT_ADDR_MODE_BYTE)
00736     {
00737       gSBCInfo.uAddress += uLen;
00738     }
00739     else
00740     {
00741       if ((gSBCInfo.uLength % pMedia->Size.uBlockSize) == 0)
00742       {
00743         gSBCInfo.uAddress++;
00744       }
00745     }
00746   }
00747   else
00748   {
00749     SBC_UpdateSenseData(pMedia, SK_NOT_READY, ASC_WRITE_PROTECTED);
00750     gSBCInfo.CommandStatus = SBC_ERROR;
00751   }
00752 
00753   ACC_LED_OFF();
00754 
00755   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00756   /* Send CSW when all data is received.                                                                    */
00757   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00758   if (gSBCInfo.uLength == 0)
00759   {
00760     BOT_SendCSW(BOT_CSW_STATUS_PASSED);
00761   }
00762 
00763   return;
00764 }
00765 
00766 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00767   * @brief  SCSI Block Command (SBC-3) - Ready Capacity 10 (0x25).
00768   * @param  pMedia: Target Media
00769   * @param  pCB: Buffer pointer of command block (CB)
00770   * @retval None
00771   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00772 static void _SBC_CMDReadCapacity10(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 *pCB)
00773 {
00774   u32 uLen = _LENGTH_READCAP10_DATA;
00775   s32 i;
00776 
00777   if (BOT_CheckCBWParameter(BOT_DIR_IN, uLen) == FALSE)
00778   {
00779     return;
00780   }
00781 
00782   for (i = 3; i >= 0; i--)
00783   {
00784     guSBC_ReadCapacity10Data[i] = (u8)((pMedia->Size.uBlockCount - 1) >> (24 - i * 8));
00785     guSBC_ReadCapacity10Data[i + 4] = (u8)(pMedia->Size.uBlockSize >> (24 - i * 8));
00786   }
00787 
00788   BOT_WriteINData(guSBC_ReadCapacity10Data, uLen, BOT_STATE_DATAIN_LAST);
00789 
00790   return;
00791 }
00792 
00793 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00794   * @brief  SCSI Block Command (MMC) - Read Format Capacity (0x23).
00795   * @param  pMedia: Target Media
00796   * @param  pCB: Buffer pointer of command block (CB)
00797   * @retval None
00798   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00799 static void _SBC_CMDReadFormatCapacity(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 *pCB)
00800 {
00801   SBC_CMDTypical_TypeDef *pCMD = (SBC_CMDTypical_TypeDef *)pCB;
00802   u32 uLen = BE2LE16(pCMD->AllocationLength);
00803 
00804   if (BOT_CheckCBWParameter(BOT_DIR_IN, uLen) == FALSE)
00805   {
00806     return;
00807   }
00808 
00809   guSBC_ReadFormatCapacityData[4] = (u8)(pMedia->Size.uBlockCount >> 24);
00810   guSBC_ReadFormatCapacityData[5] = (u8)(pMedia->Size.uBlockCount >> 16);
00811   guSBC_ReadFormatCapacityData[6] = (u8)(pMedia->Size.uBlockCount >> 8);
00812   guSBC_ReadFormatCapacityData[7] = (u8)(pMedia->Size.uBlockCount);
00813 
00814   guSBC_ReadFormatCapacityData[9]  = (u8)(pMedia->Size.uBlockSize >> 16);
00815   guSBC_ReadFormatCapacityData[10] = (u8)(pMedia->Size.uBlockSize >> 8);
00816   guSBC_ReadFormatCapacityData[11] = (u8)(pMedia->Size.uBlockSize);
00817 
00818   uLen = (uLen <= _LENGTH_READFORMATCAP_DATA) ? uLen : _LENGTH_READFORMATCAP_DATA;
00819   BOT_WriteINData(guSBC_ReadFormatCapacityData, uLen, BOT_STATE_DATAIN_LAST);
00820 
00821   return;
00822 }
00823 
00824 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00825   * @brief  SCSI Block Command (SPC-4) - Read Mode Sense 6 (0x1A).
00826   * @param  pMedia: Target Media
00827   * @param  pCB: Buffer pointer of command block (CB)
00828   * @retval None
00829   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00830 static void _SBC_CMDReadModeSense6(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 *pCB)
00831 {
00832   SBC_CMDModeSecse6_TypeDef *pCMD = (SBC_CMDModeSecse6_TypeDef *)pCB;
00833   u32 uLen = pCMD->AllocationLength;
00834   u8 uModeSense6Data[4] = {3, 0, 0, 0};
00835 
00836   if (BOT_CheckCBWParameter(BOT_DIR_IN, uLen) == FALSE)
00837   {
00838     return;
00839   }
00840 
00841   uLen = (uLen <= sizeof(uModeSense6Data)) ? uLen : sizeof(uModeSense6Data);
00842   BOT_WriteINData(uModeSense6Data, uLen, BOT_STATE_DATAIN_LAST);
00843 
00844   return;
00845 }
00846 
00847 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00848   * @brief  SCSI Block Command (SBC-3) - Prevent Allow Medium Removal (0x1E).
00849   * @param  pMedia: Target Media
00850   * @param  pCB: Buffer pointer of command block (CB)
00851   * @retval None
00852   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00853 static void _SBC_CMDPreventAllowMediumRemoval(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 *pCB)
00854 {
00855   BOT_SendCSW(BOT_CSW_STATUS_PASSED);
00856   return;
00857 }
00858 
00859 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00860   * @brief  SCSI Block Command (SBC-3) - Load Unload (0x1B).
00861   * @param  pMedia: Target Media
00862   * @param  pCB: Buffer pointer of command block (CB)
00863   * @retval None
00864   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00865 static void _SBC_CMDLoadUnload(BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia, u8 *pCB)
00866 {
00867   if (pMedia->Unmount != NULL)
00868   {
00869     pMedia->Unmount(pMedia->uId);
00870   }
00871 
00872   BOT_SendCSW(BOT_CSW_STATUS_PASSED);
00873   return;
00874 }
00875 
00876 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00877   * @brief  Get address information from CB.
00878   * @param  pCB: Buffer pointer of command block (CB)
00879   * @param  uBlockSize: Block size of specify media
00880   * @retval None
00881   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00882 static void _SBC_GetAddress(u8 *pCB, u32 uBlockSize)
00883 {
00884   u8 *pLogicalBlockAddress = &pCB[2];
00885   u8 *pTransferLength;
00886 
00887   gSBCInfo.uAddress = BE2LE32(pLogicalBlockAddress);
00888 
00889   switch (*pCB)
00890   {
00891     case SBC_CMD_READ_10:
00892     case SBC_CMD_WRITE_10:
00893     //case SBC_CMD_VERIFY_10:
00894     {
00895       pTransferLength = &pCB[7];
00896       gSBCInfo.uLength = BE2LE16(pTransferLength) * uBlockSize;
00897       break;
00898     }
00899     #if 0
00900     case SBC_CMD_READ_12:
00901     case SBC_CMD_WRITE_12:
00902     {
00903       pTransferLength = &pCB[6];
00904       gSBCInfo.uLength = BE2LE32(pTransferLength) * uBlockSize;
00905       break;
00906     }
00907     #endif
00908     default:
00909     {
00910       break;
00911     }
00912   }
00913 
00914   return;
00915 }
00916 
00917 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00918   * @brief  Find SCSI command.
00919   * @param  uCommand: Command value
00920   * @retval i: Command index
00921   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00922 static u32 _SBC_FindCommand(u8 uCommand)
00923 {
00924   s32 i;
00925 
00926   for (i = SBC_CMD_COUNT - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00927   {
00928     if (uCommand == gSBCCMDTable[i])
00929     {
00930       return i;
00931     }
00932   }
00933 
00934   return SBC_CMD_COUNT;
00935 }
